articles.title: Moon wobble may have played a role in mangrove dieback, study suggests - ABC News
articles.description: Changes in mangrove cover across Australia are driven by tidal shifts caused by the wobble of the Moon, a study suggests.

The fate of mangrove wetlands across northern Australia is deeply entwined with the wobble of the Moon, a new study suggests.
